rules.name: myRule_13
rules.label: Acc-Sub Type Merchant/Agent/Opty-Agent Processing - No Buyrate

rules.name: myRule_17
rules.label: Acc-Sub Type Merchant & Opty-Change of Ownership

Flow.description: Based on Account Sub Type and Opportunity Source Sales Type will be updated

value.stringValue: OR( [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = '3RD PARTY', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'CHANNEL', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'DIRECT' ) && ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].Opportunity_Source__c)) && [Opportunity].Products__c = 'ATM As A Service for Retail - Turnkey' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closing' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Booked'

formulas.name: formula_myRule_11
formulas.expression: OR( {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = '3RD PARTY', {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'CHANNEL', {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'DIRECT' ) && ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Opportunity_Source__c})) && {!myVariable_current.Products__c} = 'ATM As A Service for Retail - Turnkey' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closing' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Booked'

value.stringValue: OR( [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = '3RD PARTY', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'CHANNEL' ) && TEXT([Opportunity].Opportunity_Source__c) = 'Agent Processing - No Buyrate' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closing' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Booked'

formulas.name: formula_myRule_13
formulas.expression: OR( {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = '3RD PARTY', {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'CHANNEL' ) && TEXT({!myVariable_current.Opportunity_Source__c}) = 'Agent Processing - No Buyrate' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closing' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Booked'

value.stringValue: [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'DIRECT' && TEXT([Opportunity].Opportunity_Source__c) = 'Change of Ownership' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closing' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Booked'

OR( [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = '3RD PARTY', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'CHANNEL', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'DIRECT' ) && TEXT([Opportunity].Opportunity_Source__c) = 'Same Owner Re-sign' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closing' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Booked' && TEXT([Opportunity].Type) != 'Existing Customer - Service Renewal'

formulas.name: formula_myRule_19
formulas.expression: OR( {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = '3RD PARTY', {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'CHANNEL', {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'DIRECT' ) && TEXT({!myVariable_current.Opportunity_Source__c}) = 'Same Owner Re-sign' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closing' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Booked' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.Type}) != 'Existing Customer - Service Renewal'

value.stringValue: OR( [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = '3RD PARTY', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'CHANNEL', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'DIRECT' ) && TEXT([Opportunity].Opportunity_Source__c) = 'Contract Extension' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closing' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Booked'

formulas.name: formula_myRule_21
formulas.expression: OR( {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = '3RD PARTY', {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'CHANNEL', {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'DIRECT' ) && TEXT({!myVariable_current.Opportunity_Source__c}) = 'Contract Extension' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closing' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Booked'

value.stringValue: OR( [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = '3RD PARTY', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'CHANNEL', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'DIRECT' ) && TEXT([Opportunity].Opportunity_Source__c) = 'Conversion/Flip' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closing' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Booked'

OR( [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = '3RD PARTY', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'CHANNEL', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'DIRECT' ) && AND( TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closing', TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Booked', TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Lost' ) && OR( [Opportunity].Products__c = 'Allpoint Surcharge Free Network', [Opportunity].Products__c = 'ATM As A Service for Retail - ATM+', [Opportunity].Products__c = 'ATM as a Service for FI - 1.0 Dynamic Currency Conversion', [Opportunity].Products__c = 'ATM As A Service for Retail - Extended Warranty', [Opportunity].Products__c = 'Retail - Wireless Communications Package' ) && ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].Opportunity_Source__c))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3
formulas.expression: OR( {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = '3RD PARTY', {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'CHANNEL', {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'DIRECT' ) && AND( TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closing', TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Booked', TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Lost' ) && OR( {!myVariable_current.Products__c} = 'Allpoint Surcharge Free Network', {!myVariable_current.Products__c} = 'ATM As A Service for Retail - ATM+', {!myVariable_current.Products__c} = 'ATM as a Service for FI - 1.0 Dynamic Currency Conversion', {!myVariable_current.Products__c} = 'ATM As A Service for Retail - Extended Warranty', {!myVariable_current.Products__c} = 'Retail - Wireless Communications Package' ) && ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Opportunity_Source__c}))

value.stringValue: [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'DIRECT' && ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].Opportunity_Source__c)) && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closing' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Booked' && TEXT([Opportunity].Type) = 'New Customer' && OR( [Opportunity].Products__c != 'ATM as a Service for FI - 1.0 Equipment Sales', [Opportunity].Products__c != 'ATM As A Service for Retail - Equipment Sales')

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'DIRECT' && ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Opportunity_Source__c})) && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closing' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Booked' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.Type}) = 'New Customer' && OR( {!myVariable_current.Products__c} != 'ATM as a Service for FI - 1.0 Equipment Sales', {!myVariable_current.Products__c} != 'ATM As A Service for Retail - Equipment Sales')

value.stringValue: OR( [Opportunity].Products__c = 'ATM as a Service for FI - 1.0 Equipment Sales', [Opportunity].Products__c = 'ATM As A Service for Retail - Equipment Sales') && OR( [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = '3RD PARTY', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'CHANNEL', [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'DIRECT' ) && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closing' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Booked' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Lost'

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7
formulas.expression: OR( {!myVariable_current.Products__c} = 'ATM as a Service for FI - 1.0 Equipment Sales', {!myVariable_current.Products__c} = 'ATM As A Service for Retail - Equipment Sales') && OR( {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = '3RD PARTY', {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'CHANNEL', {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'DIRECT' ) && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closing' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Booked' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Lost'

value.stringValue: [Opportunity].Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c = 'DIRECT' && ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].Opportunity_Source__c)) && [Opportunity].Products__c = 'ATM As A Service for Retail - Placement' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closing' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) != 'Closed/Booked'

formulas.name: formula_myRule_9
formulas.expression: {!myVariable_current.Account.CDM_Sub_Account_Type__c} = 'DIRECT' && ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Opportunity_Source__c})) && {!myVariable_current.Products__c} = 'ATM As A Service for Retail - Placement' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closing' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Lost' && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) != 'Closed/Booked'

Flow.label: CATM Update the Sales Type on Opportunity
